template.template: Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP
template.name: Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Time to build batch
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:FILE Receive Adapter({#INSTANCE})\Time to build batch"]

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Active instance count"])>{$ACTIVE.INSTANCE.COUNT.CRIT:"{#INSTANCE}"}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Active instance count

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Active instance count"])>{$ACTIVE.INSTANCE.COUNT.HIGH:"{#INSTANCE}"}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Active instance count

dependency.name: {#INSTANCE} - Active instance count
dependency.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Active instance count"])>{$ACTIVE.INSTANCE.COUNT.CRIT:"{#INSTANCE}"}

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Active instance count"])>{$ACTIVE.INSTANCE.COUNT.WARN:"{#INSTANCE}"}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Active instance count

dependency.name: {#INSTANCE} - Active instance count
dependency.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Active instance count"])>{$ACTIVE.INSTANCE.COUNT.HIGH:"{#INSTANCE}"}

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High database session"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High database session

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High database size"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High database size

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High in-process message count"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High in-process message count

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High message delivery rate"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High message delivery rate

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High message publishing rate"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High message publishing rate

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High process memory"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High process memory

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High process memory"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Process memory exceeds threshold

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High system memory"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High system memory

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High system memory"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - System memory exceeds threshold

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\High thread count"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - High thread count

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery delay (ms)"])>{$MSG.DELIV.DELAY.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery delay

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery incoming rate"])>{$MSG.DELIV.IN.RATE.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery incoming rate

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery outgoing rate"])>{$MSG.DELIV.OUT.RATE.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery outgoing rate

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery throttling state"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery throttling state

trigger_prototype.expression: min(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery throttling state"],15m)>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery throttling state for over 15 minutes

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery throttling state duration
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery throttling state duration"]

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery throttling state duration"])>{$MSG.DELIV.THROTTLING.TIME.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery throttling state duration

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message delivery throttling state user override
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message delivery throttling state user override"]

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing delay (ms)"])>{$MSG.PUBLISH.DELAY.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing delay

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing incoming rate"])>{$MSG.PUBLISH.IN.RATE.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing incoming rate

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing outgoing rate"])>{$MSG.PUBLISH.OUT.RATE.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing outgoing rate

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing throttling state"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing throttling state

trigger_prototype.expression: min(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing throttling state"],15m)>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing throttling state for over 15 minutes

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing throttling state duration
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing throttling state duration"]

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing throttling state duration"])>{$MSG.PUBLISH.THROTTLING.TIME.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing throttling state duration

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Message publishing throttling state user override
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Message publishing throttling state user override"]

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Thread count threshold"])>0
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Thread count threshold

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Total batches committed"])>{$TOTAL.BATCH.COMMITED.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Total batches committed

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Total messages delivered"])>{$TOTAL.MSG.DELIV.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Total Messages Delivered

trigger_prototype.expression: change(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Total messages published"])>{$TOTAL.MSG.PUBLISH.WARN2}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Total Messages Published

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Agent({#INSTANCE})\Total messages published"])>{$TOTAL.MSG.PUBLISH.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Total Messages Published

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - MsgBox Dead Processes Cleanup (Purge Jobs)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\MsgBox Dead Processes Cleanup (Purge Jobs)"]

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - MsgBox Msg Cleanup (Purge Jobs)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\MsgBox Msg Cleanup (Purge Jobs)"]

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - MsgBox Msg Purge Subscriptions Job (Purge Jobs)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\MsgBox Msg Purge Subscriptions Job (Purge Jobs)"]

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - MsgBox Parts Cleanup (Purge Jobs)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\MsgBox Parts Cleanup (Purge Jobs)"]

trigger_prototype.expression: changecount(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"],1h)>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.CRIT}
trigger_prototype.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} has grown with more than {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.CRIT}

trigger_prototype.expression: changecount(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"],1h)>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.HIGH}
trigger_prototype.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} has grown with more than {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.HIGH}

dependency.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} has grown with more than {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.CRIT}
dependency.expression: changecount(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"],1h)>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.CRIT}

trigger_prototype.expression: changecount(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"],1h)>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} has grown with more than {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.WARN}

dependency.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} has grown with more than {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.HIGH}
dependency.expression: changecount(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"],1h)>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.DIFF.HIGH}

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"])>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.CRIT}
trigger_prototype.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} is over {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.CRIT}

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"])>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.HIGH}
trigger_prototype.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} is over {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.HIGH}

dependency.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} is over {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.CRIT}
dependency.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"])>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.CRIT}

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"])>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.WARN}
trigger_prototype.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} is over {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.WARN}

dependency.name: Spool Size for {#INSTANCE} is over {$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.HIGH}
dependency.expression: last(/Template App BizTalk Performance Counters EXP/perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Spool Size"])>{$BTSPOOL.SIZE.MAX.HIGH}

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Tracked Msgs Copy (Purge Jobs)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Tracked Msgs Copy (Purge Jobs)"]

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Tracking Spool Cleanup (Purge Jobs)
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:General Counters({#INSTANCE})\Tracking Spool Cleanup (Purge Jobs)"]

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Host Queue - Instance State Msg Refs - Length
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:Host Counters({#INSTANCE})\Host Queue - Instance State Msg Refs - Length"]

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Host Queue - Number of Instances
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:Host Counters({#INSTANCE})\Host Queue - Number of Instances"]

item_prototype.name: {#INSTANCE} - Host Queue - Suspended Msgs - Length
item_prototype.key: perf_counter["\BizTalk:Message Box:Host Counters({#INSTANCE})\Host Queue - Suspended Msgs - Length"]

mapping.newvalue: Database size has grown beyond threshold
Message delivery rate exceeds the message processing Rate
Publishing request rate exceeds completion rate
Imbalanced message delivery rate input rate exceeds output rate
Throttling due to high in-process message count
Throttling due to process memory pressure
Throttling due to system memory pressure
Throttling due to high thread count
Throttling due to user override on delivery
Imbalanced message publishing rate input exceeds output rate
Throttling due to process memory pressure
Throttling due to system memory pressure
Throttling due to high session count
Throttling due to high thread count
Throttling due to user override on publishing
